question: Why Los Angeles is a favourite place for film production?
option1: It is situated in a place of picturesque beauty
option2: It has no competition from European film-makers
option3: It is the birth place of many actors
option4: The local population watch more films than television
answer: It is situated in a place of picturesque beauty
explanation: One of the attractions of Los Angeles for the film industry has been the city\'s incredibly varied landscape, from seaside to desert to mountain slope and fruit grove.
